commands.stdout:
>>> Step 1 - Setup envibe
➜  my-project npx -y envibe setup
Setting up envibe...
[1/4] Creating .env.manifest.yaml...
     Classified 5 variables from .env.example
[2/4] Generating .env.ai...
     Generated with 4 AI-visible variables
[3/4] Configuring .gitignore...
     Added 9 patterns
[4/4] Configuring .claude/settings.json...
     Added: 18 deny rules, 3 allow rules, MCP server
  Recommended next steps:
    → Add to .gitignore: .env.ai
    → Review settings: envibe view
Setup complete! Next steps:
  1. Review .env.manifest.yaml and adjust access levels
  2. Create .env with your actual secrets (it's gitignored)
  3. Run 'envibe generate' to update .env.ai
  4. AI will read .env.ai and use MCP tools (secrets protected)

all_commands_text:
echo ">>> Step 1 - Setup envibe"
npx -y envibe setup
echo ">>> Step 2 - View configuration"
npx envibe view
echo ">>> Step 3 - Generate .env.ai"
npx envibe generate
